question: 1. I can fall off a building and live, but in water I will die. What am I?
2. I am a vegetable that bugs stay away from. What am I?
3. I have hundreds of legs but I can only lean; You make me feel dirty so you feel clean. What am I?
4. I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
5. I am gentle enough to soothe your skin, light enough to fly in the sky, strong enough to crack rocks. What am I?
6. The more you take of me, the more you leave behind. What am I?
7. I shrink smaller every time I take a bath. What am I?
8. I have a face but no eyes, hands but no arms. What am I?
9. The more you take away from me, the bigger I shall get. What am I?
10. I jump when I walk and sit when I stand. What am I?
11. You can catch me but cannot throw me. What am I?
12. I start with 'T', ends with 'T', and within me is 'T'. What am I?
13. Soft, hairy, from door to door. I am the pet that always stays on the floor. What am I?
14. I must be broken before you can use me. What am I?
15. I go up when the rain comes down. What am I?
